title: 2- & 4-Slice Toasters | KitchenAid
description: Features one-touch motorized lift control with LCD display and digital progress bar. Extra-wide 1.5-inch slots toast the thickest bagels, breads or pastries.

asset.author: KitchenAid
asset.hookText:
Features one-touch motorized lift control with LCD display and digital progress bar. Extra-wide 1.5-inch slots toast the thickest bagels, breads or pastries.

Go to http://www.kitchenaid.com/countertop-appliances/ for more countertop appliance information and culinary inspiration.
